title: 1. Registration and Welcome Tea
details: The Film Festival will be a tribute to an internationally renowned film personality.

title: 2. Inaugural Address / Opening Ceremony
details: Delivered by director of the festival and the chief guest.

title: 3. Keynote Speeches & Festival Overview
details: Featuring one international speaker and two speakers from our core committee. A brief introduction to the festival's theme and objectives

title: 4. Screening of Nominated Short Films
details: A showcase of short films selected by our pre-screening jury.

title: 5. Storytelling Session
details: A creative and engaging storytelling session by a guest speaker.

title: 6. Documentary Showcase
details: A screening of 1 minute trailer of the documentary film.

title: 7. Introduction of Jury Members
details: Featuring one esteemed jury member and professional guest speaker from India.

title: 8. Award Announcements
details: Winners to be announced by the jury members.

title: 9. Award Ceremony
details: Presentation of awards to the winners, including a special award for the best film.
